title: There is no dnd on option on new pixel 3 and new pixel stand
content: We are trying to set up the automatic DND for the Google stand and a new pixel 3. Normally this option would appear under connected devices but the option is not present. It is present on another phone, pixel 3XL, with a similar pixel stand. But on the pixel 3 the option does not come up
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
